amendment.description: Amendment provides $60 million for the HUD HOPE VI program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new item relating to revitalization of severely distressed public housing(Hope VI). The amendment seeks to restore $60,000,000 in funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (AL) amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 173 (Roll no. 340).
